text:
In default publication, when live document gets edited, its workflow status goes
from live to authoring. This enables deletition. Then if it is deleted live
version seems to be orphaned. There is no way to deactivate nor edit it.
Shouldn't it be deleted as well?
creator: maciejka@tiger.com.pl

text:
Actually the delete usecase shouldn't check the workflow state, but rather if a
live version exists.
creator: andreas@apache.org
